snippet: HOWARD--Bernard. October 20, 1921. We love you with all of our hearts and were blessed to have you in our lives. You were and will continue to be a role model to us for your ever present optimism, intelligence, love of life and for the true gentleman that you were. May you rest in peace. We will love you forever. Lorrie, Stuart, Adam, Ellen, Sy, Kathy, Mitchell, Joshua, Ned, Debbie, Jeffrey 1/3
lead_paragraph: HOWARD--Bernard. October 20, 1921. We love you with all of our hearts and were blessed to have you in our lives. You were and will continue to be a role model to us for your ever present optimism, intelligence, love of life and for the true gentleman that you were. May you rest in peace. We will love you forever. Lorrie, Stuart, Adam, Ellen, Sy, Kathy, Mitchell, Joshua, Ned, Debbie, Jeffrey 1/3
